page.title: 09THE POSTBUS
page.content: On the 27th of June 1985 some of us went to see one of the last postbuses from Gislingham. It is stopping because it costs too much to run and the council wonÂ£t pay the cost. The driver has driven the postbus for ten years. The postbus is a minibus, the postman collects passengers and letters. The fare was ten pence from Wickham Skeith to Stoke Ash. The bus is going to Norwich after closing down. The day after we were in the East Anglian Daily Times. The postbus goes to lots of places. The postbus has sixty to eighty passengers a week. The driver doesn't want the bus to close down because the passengers are like a family to him. We asked the postmistress whether people would miss the bus, she said "Yes a lot".
